Package view

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
view.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, ConfigLoadNotifier, DeleteUserNotifier, NewPlayNotifier, PianoNotifier, PlaylistMenuNotifier, SongsMenuNotifier
public class Menu
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, SongsMenuNotifier, PlaylistMenuNotifier, DeleteUserNotifier, PianoNotifier, ConfigLoadNotifier, NewPlayNotifier
JFrame that contains everything in the app once the user has logged in
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu​(PlaylistBarEvent playE, SongRequest songRequestE, MenuEvent menuE, SongsEvent songsE, PlaylistEvent playlistE, RankingEvent rankingE, TeclaEvent keyE, UpdateConfigEvent configE, RecordingEvent recordE, SongRequestPiano sRP)
      Sets up all the content in the panel and initiates every tab and the bottom player
      Parameters:
      playE - Manages events from the Music player
      songRequestE - Manages new songs to be played on the music player
      menuE - Manages the exiting of the session
      songsE - Manages events regarding songs and playlists
      playlistE - Manages events related to playlists, removing, adding, getting...
      rankingE - Manages events regarding statistics information
      keyE - Manages events regarding key presses
      configE - Manages events regarding the update of the database from config changes
      recordE - Manages events relating to the recording of songs by the user
      sRP - Manages the requests of playing a song in the piano
